Research Overview

My research focuses on computational disinformation, network science, and the societal impacts of AI. I am particularly interested in how generative models can be used to understand and simulate human behavior through Human-Digital Twins (HDTs).

Current Focus: Directing two DARPA initiatives on Human-AI Teaming (HAT) and evaluating LLM-driven influence operations.
